briefdescription.para: Whether the pixel selection tool is initialized with a target widget and pixel selection tool.
Construct with parent object and title.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to target widget (pixel selection tool will be drawn on top of it)

briefdescription.para: Get the context menu for the action.
Get pointer to the target on which the pixel selection tool operates.
Get pointer to pixel selection tool.

parameterdescription.para: Whether shortcuts are enabled or not

briefdescription.para: Listens to the events of target object.

parameterdescription.para: Target object to watch for events

simplesect.para: Variant representation of the selection action

briefdescription.para: Get whether the pixel selection tool is initialized with a target widget and pixel selection tool.

simplesect.para: Boolean determining whether the pixel selection tool is initialized with a target widget and pixel selection tool

briefdescription.para: Connect this action to a public action.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to public action to connect to
Whether to also connect descendant child actions

briefdescription.para: Disconnect this action from its public action.

parameterdescription.para: Whether to also disconnect descendant child actions
